function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Government decision making complexity leading to delays in pandemic response","Impact":"Increase in infection rates due to delayed actions and decisions","Mitigation":"Streamlining decision-making processes, increasing coordination between government bodies","Technologies":"Data analytics for informed decision making, communication platforms for inter-agency coordination","People":"Public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to tracking super spreaders and individuals for contact tracing","Impact":"Risk of intrusion into individual privacy, potential backlash from the public","Mitigation":"Implementing strict data privacy regulations, transparent communication about data usage","Technologies":"Anonymized data collection, encryption techniques for data protection","People":"General public, individuals being tracked","Owner":"Government, tech companies, data privacy advocates"},{"Description":"Psychological impact of prolonged quarantine on mental health","Impact":"Increase in depression and anxiety, decrease in overall mental well-being","Mitigation":"Mental health support services, promoting social connection through virtual means","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms for remote counseling, social media for virtual support groups","People":"General public, individuals in quarantine","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals, community organizations"}]}
